info.name: Novel Backend API
info.description:
Complete API collection for Novel Backend application with Role-Based Access Control (RBAC).

## Roles:
- **ADMIN**: Full access to all features including user/role management
- **MODERATOR**: Can manage content (stories, chapters, genres) and moderate comments
- **USER**: Can read content, create comments/ratings, manage own data
- **PUBLIC**: Read-only access to stories, chapters, genres

**Note:** Each user can only have ONE role at a time.

## Authentication:
1. Register or login to get JWT token
2. Token is automatically saved to collection variables
3. All authenticated requests use the bearer token

## JPA Auditing Feature (NEW - December 2025)
✨ **All responses now include audit fields tracking who created/modified data:**
- `createdBy`: User ID who created the resource (null for system operations)
- `createdAt`: ISO 8601 timestamp when resource was created
- `lastModifiedBy`: User ID who last modified the resource (null for system operations)
- `updatedAt`: ISO 8601 timestamp when resource was last updated

**Audited Entities:**
- Stories: CREATE → audit fields set automatically
- Chapters: CREATE/UPDATE → audit fields managed automatically  
- CrawlJobs: Created automatically for crawl operations

**Example Response (Create Story):**
```json
{
  "id": 1,
  "title": "My Novel",
  "authorName": "Author",
  "createdBy": 123,
  "createdAt": "2025-12-22T10:00:00",
  "lastModifiedBy": 123,
  "updatedAt": "2025-12-22T10:00:00"
}
```

**Security:**
- `createdBy` and `lastModifiedBy` are automatically captured from Spring Security context
- System/background operations have null user IDs (gracefully handled)
- Timestamps are server-side managed (cannot be spoofed by client)
- No code changes needed - works automatically!

## Admin Endpoints:
- Require ADMIN role
- User management: activate/deactivate, update user roles
- Role management: create, update, delete custom roles
- Statistics and monitoring

## Testing:
1. Create users with different roles (USER, MODERATOR, ADMIN)
2. Login with each role to test different access levels
3. Admin endpoints are in separate folders

request.description: Register a new user with default USER role
Register a new user with a specific role. Available roles: USER, MODERATOR, ADMIN
Login and automatically save JWT token to collection variables. Response includes user info with role.

Create a new story. Requires ADMIN or MODERATOR role.

**Response includes audit fields (JPA Auditing):**
- `createdBy`: User ID who created the story
- `createdAt`: Timestamp when story was created
- `lastModifiedBy`: User ID who last modified the story
- `updatedAt`: Timestamp when story was last updated

Update an existing story. Requires ADMIN or MODERATOR role.

**Audit Fields Behavior (JPA Auditing):**
- `createdBy`: Unchanged (immutable)
- `createdAt`: Unchanged (immutable)
- `lastModifiedBy`: Updated to current user ID
- `updatedAt`: Updated to current timestamp

Add a single genre to an existing story. Requires ADMIN or MODERATOR role.

**Path Parameters:**
- `storyId`: ID of the story
- `genreId`: ID of the genre to add

**Returns:** Updated story with all genres

Remove a single genre from a story. Requires ADMIN or MODERATOR role.

**Path Parameters:**
- `storyId`: ID of the story
- `genreId`: ID of the genre to remove

**Returns:** Updated story with remaining genres

Replace all genres for a story with a new set. Requires ADMIN or MODERATOR role.

**Path Parameters:**
- `storyId`: ID of the story

**Request Body:**
Array of genre IDs (e.g., [1, 2, 3])

**Returns:** Updated story with the new genres

Translate story title and/or description from Japanese to Vietnamese.

**✨ NEW: Also romanizes author name automatically!**

**Request Body:**
- `storyId` (required): ID of the story to translate
- `translateTitle` (optional): Translate title (default: true)
- `translateDescription` (optional): Translate description (default: true)

**What Gets Translated:**
- Title: `rawTitle` → `translatedTitle` (Japanese → Vietnamese)
- Description: `rawDescription` → `translatedDescription` (Japanese → Vietnamese)
- **Author Name: `rawAuthorName` → `translatedAuthorName` (Japanese → Romaji)** ← NEW!

**Note about Author Name:**
- Author name is ROMANIZED (converted to Romaji), NOT translated
- Example: "錬金王" → "Renkinō" (not "Vua Giả Kim")
- This preserves the author's name while making it readable

**Response includes:**
- `storyId`: ID of translated story
- `originalTitle`: Raw Japanese title
- `translatedTitle`: Vietnamese title
- `originalAuthorName`: Raw Japanese author name (NEW!)
- `translatedAuthorName`: Romanized author name (NEW!)
- `originalDescription`: Raw Japanese description
- `translatedDescription`: Vietnamese description
- `message`: Success message

**Example Response:**
```json
{
  "storyId": 3,
  "originalTitle": "転生～運命の書き換え～",
  "translatedTitle": "Chuyển Sinh ～Viết Lại Số Phận～",
  "originalAuthorName": "錬金王",
  "translatedAuthorName": "Renkinō",
  "originalDescription": "...",
  "translatedDescription": "...",
  "message": "Story translated successfully"
}
```

Translate story by ID (simplified version). Translates both title and description by default.

**✨ NEW: Also romanizes author name automatically!**

**What Gets Translated:**
- Title: Japanese → Vietnamese
- Description: Japanese → Vietnamese
- **Author Name: Japanese → Romaji (NEW!)**

**Response includes author name fields:**
- `originalAuthorName`: e.g., "錬金王"
- `translatedAuthorName`: e.g., "Renkinō"

**✨ NEW ENDPOINT:** Get comprehensive story details with full metadata.

**Performance:**
- First request: ~50-100ms (database query)
- Cached requests: ~5-10ms (90% faster!)
- Cache duration: 10 minutes

**Returns:**
- All story information (title, author, description in raw/translated)
- Story status (DRAFT, PUBLISHED, COMPLETED, ARCHIVED)
- View count
- Featured status
- Total chapters
- Average rating & total ratings
- Total comments
- Total favorites
- List of genres
- Latest chapter info (if available)

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "id": 1,
  "title": "My Epic Fantasy",
  "status": "PUBLISHED",
  "viewCount": 1500,
  "featured": false,
  "totalChapters": 50,
  "averageRating": 4.5,
  "totalRatings": 123,
  "totalComments": 45,
  "totalFavorites": 234,
  "genres": [...],
  "latestChapter": {
    "id": 50,
    "chapterIndex": 50,
    "title": "Chapter 50: The Final Battle",
    "updatedAt": "2025-12-20T15:30:00"
  }
}
```

Get paginated list of stories with full metadata (for homepage display).

**Features:**
- Includes all metadata (views, ratings, comments, favorites)
- Supports filtering by keyword, genre ID, or genre name
- Cached for performance

**Use Cases:**
- Homepage story listing
- Genre-based filtering
- Search results with metadata

query.description: true to feature, false to unfeature

request.description:
Set or unset featured status for a story. **Requires ADMIN role.**

**Features:**
- Only ADMIN can mark stories as featured
- Automatically invalidates cache
- Featured stories appear in homepage carousel

**Use Case:**
Admin dashboard to manage featured content

Create a new chapter for a story. Requires ADMIN or MODERATOR role.

**Response includes audit fields (JPA Auditing):**
- `createdBy`: User ID who created the chapter
- `createdAt`: Timestamp when chapter was created
- `lastModifiedBy`: User ID who last modified the chapter
- `updatedAt`: Timestamp when chapter was last updated

Update an existing chapter. Requires ADMIN or MODERATOR role.

**Audit Fields Behavior (JPA Auditing):**
- `createdBy`: Unchanged (immutable)
- `createdAt`: Unchanged (immutable)
- `lastModifiedBy`: Updated to current user ID
- `updatedAt`: Updated to current timestamp

Translate a single chapter from Japanese to Vietnamese.

**✨ NEW: Also translates chapter title automatically!**

**Important:** Use the chapter's database ID, not the chapter index!
- Example: If chapter 3 has ID=8, use `/chapters/8/translate` not `/chapters/3/translate`
- Get correct IDs via: `GET /api/stories/{storyId}/chapters`

**What Gets Translated:**
- **Chapter Title: `rawTitle` → `translatedTitle` (NEW!)**
  - Example: "プロローグ" → "Lời Mở Đầu"
- Chapter Content: `rawContent` → `translatedContent`
  - Full chapter text from Japanese to Vietnamese

**Response includes:**
```json
{
  "id": 8,
  "storyId": 3,
  "chapterIndex": 3,
  "title": "第二話「ステータス」",
  "rawTitle": "第二話「ステータス」",
  "translatedTitle": "Chương 2: Trạng Thái",
  "rawContent": "...",
  "translatedContent": "...",
  "translateStatus": "SUCCESS"
}
```

**To find correct chapter ID:**
1. `GET /api/stories/{storyId}/chapters` - Get all chapters
2. Find chapter with desired `chapterIndex`
3. Use its `id` field (not `chapterIndex`) in translate URL

Translate all untranslated chapters of a story.

**✨ NEW: Translates both chapter titles and content!**

**What Gets Translated:**
- All chapter titles (rawTitle → translatedTitle)
- All chapter content (rawContent → translatedContent)
- Only processes chapters with `translateStatus: NONE`

**Features:**
- Automatic delay between chapters to avoid rate limiting
- Updates each chapter's `translateStatus` to SUCCESS/FAILED
- Continues even if some chapters fail

**Response:**
```json
{
  "message": "Translation completed for story {storyId}"
}
```

**Check progress:**
- `GET /api/stories/{storyId}/chapters` - See translateStatus for each chapter

Retry translating chapters that previously failed.

**Authorization:**
- ADMIN: Can retry for any story
- MODERATOR: Can only retry for stories they created
- Others: 403 Forbidden

**What it does:**
- Finds all chapters with `translateStatus: FAILED`
- Attempts to translate them again (title + content)
- Updates status based on result

**Use case:** If translation failed due to rate limiting or temporary API issues, this retries those chapters.

Export a complete story to EPUB format.

**Authentication:** Requires JWT token (any authenticated user)

**Features:**
- Downloads all chapters of the story
- Includes cover image (if available)
- Uses translated content when available, falls back to raw content
- Generates a properly formatted EPUB file

**Response:**
- Content-Type: application/epub+zip
- File will be downloaded as: story_{id}_full.epub

Export a specific chapter range of a story to EPUB format.

**Authentication:** Requires JWT token (any authenticated user)

**Parameters:**
- `start`: Starting chapter index (inclusive)
- `end`: Ending chapter index (inclusive)

**Features:**
- Downloads only specified chapter range
- Includes cover image (if available)
- Uses translated content when available, falls back to raw content
- Generates a properly formatted EPUB file

**Response:**
- Content-Type: application/epub+zip
- File will be downloaded as: story_{id}_ch{start}-{end}.epub

Crawl a novel from Syosetu (ncode.syosetu.com). Requires ADMIN or MODERATOR role.

**Request Body:**
- `novelUrl` (required): Full URL of the novel on Syosetu
- `startChapter` (optional): Starting chapter number. If omitted along with endChapter, auto-detects next chapter to crawl
- `endChapter` (optional): Ending chapter number. If omitted along with startChapter, auto-detects next chapter to crawl

**✨ NEW Features (Updated Jan 2026):**
- ✅ **Auto-crawl next chapter**: Omit startChapter and endChapter to automatically crawl the next chapter after the last one in DB
- ✅ **Smart detection**: Returns error if no more chapters available on Syosetu
- ✅ Extracts author name (e.g., "錬金王") and stores in `rawAuthorName`
- ✅ Extracts actual chapter titles (e.g., "プロローグ", "第一話") instead of generic "Chapter 1"
- ✅ Automatically creates CrawlJob for tracking (check via GET /api/jobs)
- ✅ Stores raw Japanese text in `raw_*` fields for later translation
- ✅ Updates existing stories if URL already crawled

**What Gets Crawled:**
- Story title → `rawTitle`
- Story description → `rawDescription`  
- Author name → `rawAuthorName`
- Chapter titles → `rawTitle` per chapter
- Chapter content → `rawContent` per chapter

**Example URLs:**
- https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5375cy/ (Author: 錬金王)
- https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9669bk/ (Chapters: プロローグ, 第一話, etc.)

**Response:**
- `storyId`: ID of the created/updated story
- `title`: Story title
- `description`: Story description
- `chaptersCrawled`: Total chapters attempted
- `chaptersSucceeded`: Successfully crawled chapters
- `chaptersFailed`: Failed chapters
- `message`: Summary message

**After Crawling:**
1. Check crawl job: `GET /api/jobs` or `GET /api/jobs/by-story/{storyId}`
2. Translate story: `POST /api/stories/translate/story/{storyId}` (translates title, desc, romanizes author)
3. Translate chapters: `POST /api/stories/{storyId}/chapters/{chapterId}/translate` (translates title + content)
Crawl a single chapter from Syosetu. Set startChapter and endChapter to the same value.
Crawl multiple chapters (1-10) from a Syosetu novel. The service adds polite delays between requests to avoid overloading the server.
Re-crawl an existing story to add more chapters or update existing content. If the story URL already exists in the database, it will be updated instead of creating a new story.

**✨ NEW: Auto-crawl next chapter**

Crawl the next chapter automatically without specifying chapter numbers.

**How it works:**
- If the story already exists in DB: Crawls the chapter after the last one (e.g., if last chapter is 5, crawls chapter 6)
- If story is new: Crawls chapter 1
- If no next chapter exists on Syosetu: Returns error message "No next chapter available. Story already has all available chapters (last chapter: X)"

**Request Body:**
- `novelUrl` (required): Full URL of the novel on Syosetu
- `startChapter` (optional): Omit to auto-detect next chapter
- `endChapter` (optional): Omit to auto-detect next chapter

**Example Response (success):**
```json
{
  "storyId": 1,
  "title": "錬金術師です。自重はゴミ箱に捨ててきました。",
  "chaptersCrawled": 1,
  "chaptersSucceeded": 1,
  "chaptersFailed": 0,
  "message": "Crawl completed: 1 succeeded, 0 failed out of 1 chapters"
}
```

**Example Response (no more chapters):**
```json
{
  "error": "No next chapter available. Story already has all available chapters (last chapter: 350)"
}
```

formdata.description: Select an image file (JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP)

request.description:
Upload a novel cover image to Cloudinary CDN.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)
**Required Role:** ADMIN or MODERATOR

**Features:**
- Automatic WebP conversion for optimal web performance
- Auto quality optimization
- Stored in 'novel_covers' folder
- Returns secure HTTPS URL
- 10MB file size limit

**Request:**
- Method: POST
- Content-Type: multipart/form-data
- Body: file (image file)

**Response (Success - 200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Image uploaded successfully",
  "url": "https://res.cloudinary.com/your-cloud/image/upload/v1234567890/novel_covers/xyz.webp",
  "originalFilename": "cover.jpg"
}
```

**Response (Error - 400):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "error": "File must be an image"
}
```

**Response (Error - 401):**
```json
{
  "error": "Unauthorized",
  "message": "JWT token missing or invalid"
}
```

**Response (Error - 403):**
```json
{
  "error": "Forbidden",
  "message": "Insufficient permissions - requires ADMIN or MODERATOR role"
}
```

**Validation Rules:**
- File must not be empty
- File must be an image (image/*)
- File size must be ≤ 10MB

**Usage:**
1. Login as ADMIN or MODERATOR to get JWT token
2. Select an image file in the 'file' field
3. Send request
4. Use returned URL for story cover image

**Example Use Cases:**
- Upload cover for new novel
- Update existing novel cover
- Upload author avatar
- Upload promotional images

item.name: User Profile & Password Management
item.description: Endpoints for user profile management, password changes, and password reset via email

request.description:
**Get Current User Profile**

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)
**Role:** Any authenticated user

**Response:**
```json
{
  "id": 1,
  "email": "user@example.com",
  "displayName": "John Doe",
  "avatarUrl": "https://res.cloudinary.com/.../avatar.webp",
  "createdAt": "2025-12-30T10:00:00",
  "active": true,
  "roles": ["USER"]
}
```

**Note:** avatarUrl will be null if user hasn't uploaded an avatar

**Update Current User Profile**

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)
**Role:** Any authenticated user

**Request Body:**
```json
{
  "displayName": "New Display Name"
}
```

**Response:**
- User profile with updated information
- Email notification sent to user

**Validation:**
- displayName: required, 1-255 characters

**Upload or Update User Avatar**

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)
**Role:** Any authenticated user

**Request:**
- Content-Type: multipart/form-data
- Field name: file
- File type: Image (jpg, png, gif, webp, etc.)
- Max size: 5MB

**Response:**
```json
{
  "id": 1,
  "email": "user@example.com",
  "displayName": "John Doe",
  "avatarUrl": "https://res.cloudinary.com/.../avatar.webp",
  "createdAt": "2025-12-30T10:00:00",
  "active": true,
  "roles": ["USER"]
}
```

**Features:**
- Image automatically converted to WebP format
- Resized to 400x400 pixels
- Face detection and centering applied
- Stored in Cloudinary cloud storage
- Replaces existing avatar if present

**Validation:**
- File must be an image
- Maximum file size: 5MB

**Errors:**
- 400: File is required
- 400: File must be an image
- 400: File size exceeds 5MB

**Delete User Avatar**

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)
**Role:** Any authenticated user

**Response:**
```json
{
  "id": 1,
  "email": "user@example.com",
  "displayName": "John Doe",
  "avatarUrl": null,
  "createdAt": "2025-12-30T10:00:00",
  "active": true,
  "roles": ["USER"]
}
```

**Features:**
- Removes avatar URL from user profile
- Returns updated user profile
- User can only delete their own avatar

**Errors:**
- 400: User does not have an avatar to delete

**Change User Password**

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)
**Role:** Any authenticated user

**Request Body:**
```json
{
  "currentPassword": "oldPassword123",
  "newPassword": "newPassword456"
}
```

**Response:**
```json
{
  "message": "Password changed successfully"
}
```

**Features:**
- Verifies current password before change
- Email notification sent after change
- New password must be at least 6 characters

**Errors:**
- 400: Current password is incorrect
- 400: New password too short

**Request Password Reset**

**Authentication:** Not required (public endpoint)

**Request Body:**
```json
{
  "email": "user@example.com"
}
```

**Response:**
```json
{
  "message": "If an account with that email exists, a password reset link has been sent"
}
```

**Features:**
- Sends email with password reset token
- Token expires in 1 hour
- Token can only be used once
- Security: Same response whether email exists or not

**Email Content:**
- Reset link with token
- Expiration time
- Instructions

**Reset Password with Token**

**Authentication:** Not required (public endpoint)

**Request Body:**
```json
{
  "token": "uuid-from-email",
  "newPassword": "newSecurePassword123"
}
```

**Response:**
```json
{
  "message": "Password reset successfully"
}
```

**Features:**
- Uses token from forgot password email
- Token must be valid and not expired
- Token can only be used once
- Email notification sent after reset

**Errors:**
- 400: Invalid or expired token
- 400: Token already used
- 400: New password too short (min 6 chars)

item.name: Admin - User Management (Extended)
item.description: Extended admin capabilities for user account management

variable.description: ID of the user to delete

request.description:
**Delete User Account (Admin)**

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)
**Role:** ADMIN only

**Response:** 204 No Content

**Features:**
- Permanently deletes user account
- Deletes all associated password reset tokens
- Admin cannot delete their own account (safety check)

**Errors:**
- 400: Cannot delete your own account
- 404: User not found
- 403: Requires ADMIN role

variable.description: ID of the user whose password to reset

request.description:
**Admin Reset User Password**

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)
**Role:** ADMIN only

**Request Body:**
```json
{
  "newPassword": "temporaryPassword123"
}
```

**Response:**
```json
{
  "message": "Password reset successfully",
  "temporaryPassword": "temporaryPassword123"
}
```

**Features:**
- Admin can reset any user's password
- Email sent to user with temporary password
- User should change password immediately
- All existing password reset tokens deleted

**Use Cases:**
- User locked out of account
- Security incident response
- Account recovery

**Search Users by Email**

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)
**Role:** ADMIN only

**Query Parameters:**
- `email` (required): Email search term (contains, case-insensitive)
- `page` (optional): Page number (default: 0)
- `size` (optional): Page size (default: 20)
- `sort` (optional): Sort field (default: createdAt,desc)

item.name: Recommendations
item.description: Personalized story recommendations using Collaborative Filtering and Content-based Filtering algorithms

request.description:
**Get personalized recommendations - "Có thể bạn sẽ thích"**

**Algorithm: Hybrid Approach**
- 40% Content-based Filtering (based on your favorite genres)
- 30% Collaborative Filtering (based on users with similar tastes)
- 20% Trending stories (popular recent stories)
- 10% High-rated stories (fallback)

**Features:**
- Analyzes reading history, ratings, and favorites
- Excludes stories you've already read
- Adapts to your preferences over time

**Requirements:**
- Requires authentication (JWT token)

**Use Cases:**
- Homepage 'You May Like' section
- Personalized discovery page
- User dashboard recommendations

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "stories": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "title": "Story Title",
      "authorName": "Author",
      "genres": [...],
      ...
    }
  ],
  "type": "HYBRID",
  "totalCount": 10,
  "explanation": "Based on your reading history, preferences, and trending stories"
}
```

**Get content-based recommendations only**

**Algorithm: Content-based Filtering**
- Analyzes genres from your reading history
- Weighted by ratings (high ratings = prefer genre)
- Weighted by favorites (strongest signal)

**Scoring System:**
- Reading History: +1.0 per story
- High Rating (4-5): +2.0 per story
- Low Rating (1-2): -0.5 per story (avoid genre)
- Neutral (3): +0.5 per story
- Favorites: +3.0 per story (strongest signal)

**Requirements:**
- Requires authentication
- User should have some reading history

**Use Cases:**
- Genre-based discovery
- Testing content-based algorithm
- When collaborative filtering data is insufficient

**Get collaborative filtering recommendations**

**Algorithm: Collaborative Filtering (User-based)**
- Finds users who rated similar stories as you
- Calculates similarity using Jaccard similarity
- Recommends highly-rated stories from similar users
- Weighted by similarity score and rating value

**Similarity Calculation:**
```
Jaccard Similarity = Common Stories / Total Stories User A

Example:
User A rated: [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
User B rated: [3, 4, 5, 6, 7]
Common: [3, 4, 5] = 3 stories
Similarity = 3 / 5 = 0.6 (60%)
```

**Requirements:**
- Requires authentication
- User must have rated at least 1 story
- Other users must have rated same stories

**Use Cases:**
- Social-based discovery
- "Users like you also enjoyed"
- Testing collaborative filtering algorithm

**Get similar stories to a specific story (authenticated)**

**Algorithm: Semantic Similarity + Genre-based**
- **Primary:** Uses semantic embeddings (pgvector + Gemini AI) for content similarity
- **Fallback:** Genre-based similarity if embeddings not available
- Excludes stories you've already read

**How it works:**
1. If story has embeddings → Use cosine similarity search
2. Otherwise → Find stories in same genres
3. Filter out user's read stories
4. Sort by similarity score

**Requirements:**
- Requires authentication
- Story ID must exist

**Use Cases:**
- Story detail page recommendations
- "Similar Stories" section
- "Readers also liked" section
- Related content suggestions

**Get similar stories (public access - no authentication)**

**Algorithm: Same as authenticated version**
- Semantic similarity using embeddings
- Genre-based fallback
- Does NOT exclude user's read stories (anonymous)

**Differences from authenticated endpoint:**
- ✅ No authentication required
- ✅ Works for anonymous users
- ✅ SEO-friendly (crawlable by search engines)
- ❌ Cannot personalize based on user's read history

**Requirements:**
- No authentication required
- Story ID must exist

**Use Cases:**
- Similar stories for anonymous users
- Public story browsing
- SEO-friendly recommendations
- Story previews before login

**Get cold-start recommendations for new users**

**Cold-Start Strategies:**
1. **New User Strategy** (≤3 interactions)
   - 70% Trending stories
   - 30% High-rated stories
2. **Onboarding-Based** (if user completed onboarding)
   - Recommend based on preferred genres
3. **New Item Strategy** (for recent stories)
   - Boost stories < 14 days old

**Requires:** Authentication

**Use Cases:**
- First-time user recommendations
- Users with minimal reading history
- Bootstrap personalization

**Check if user is in cold-start state**

Returns:
```json
{
  "isColdStart": true,
  "recommendedStrategy": "NEW_USER",
  "interactionCount": 2
}
```

**Requires:** Authentication

item.name: User Analytics
item.description: User profile analytics and behavior metrics

request.description:
**Get detailed user analytics profile**

Returns:
- Profile embedding (weighted average of read stories)
- Total stories/chapters read
- Average completion rate
- Reading velocity (chapters per week)
- Genre diversity score
- Last profile update timestamp

**Requires:** Authentication

**Use Cases:**
- User dashboard analytics
- Reading behavior insights
- Personalization data

**Manually trigger profile analytics update**

Recalculates:
- Reading metrics
- Completion rate
- Reading velocity
- Genre diversity

**Requires:** Authentication

**When to use:**
- After reading several stories
- When recommendations seem stale
- Manual profile refresh

**Update user profile embedding**

Recalculates weighted average of story embeddings with time decay.

**Time Decay:**
- Recent stories: Higher weight
- Older stories: Lower weight (exponential decay)

**Requires:** Authentication

**Computationally expensive** - use sparingly

**Save user preferences from onboarding**

**Reading Frequency:**
- DAILY, WEEKLY, MONTHLY, CASUAL

**Preferred Length:**
- SHORT, MEDIUM, LONG, EPIC, ANY

**Completion Preference:**
- COMPLETIONIST: Prefers to finish stories
- EXPLORER: Tries many stories, doesn't always finish
- BALANCED: Mix of both

**Exploration Preference:**
- SAFE: Stick to known genres
- ADVENTUROUS: Try new genres
- BALANCED: Mix of both

**Requires:** Authentication

**Get recommendations based on onboarding preferences**

Uses preferred genres from onboarding to recommend stories.

**Requires:** 
- Authentication
- Completed onboarding

**Generate text embedding using specified strategy**

**Strategies:**
- **GEMINI**: Cloud API, 768-dim, best quality
- **WORD2VEC**: Local, 300-dim, good quality
- **TFIDF**: Local, 500-dim, fast
- **AUTO**: Auto-fallback (Gemini → Word2Vec → TF-IDF)

**Requires:** ADMIN or MODERATOR role

**Response:**
```json
{
  "embedding": [0.1, 0.2, ...],
  "dimension": 768,
  "strategy": "GEMINI",
  "text": "..."
}
```
